recipe

Get out the following ingredients:

avacado 4.4 ounce
garlic clove 2 unit
red onion 1.7 ounce
lime 1.5 Tbsp
salt 4 dash
black pepper 5 dash
jalapeno 2 unit
cilantro 0.1 ounce
Show IngrendientsShow All Steps

Estimated Time: 0 Minutes

Recipe:

Get out scale
Put string chopper on scale and tar
Put in 4.4 ounces avacado
Put in 2 garlic cloves
Put in 1.7 ounces red onion
Put in 1½ Tbsp lime
Put in 4 dashs salt
Put in 5 dashs black pepper
Put in 2 jalapenos
Put in the leaves only, (NO STEMS) .1 ounce cilantro
Pull string to puree
FINISHED

Get out the following ingredients:

avacado 5.5 ounce
garlic clove 2 unit
red onion 1.7 ounce
lime 1.5 Tbsp
salt 4 dash
black pepper 0.5 dash
habanero 0.5 unit
mango 0.5 ounce
cilantro 0.1 ounce
Show IngrendientsShow All Steps

Estimated Time: 0 Minutes

Recipe:

Get out scale
Put in 5½ ounces avacado
Put string chopper on scale and tar
Put in 2 garlic cloves
Put in 1.7 ounces red onion
Put in 1½ Tbsp lime
Put in 4 dashs salt
Put in ½ dash black pepper
Put in habanero
Put in ½ ounce mango
Put in the leaves only, (NO STEMS) .1 ounce cilantro
Pull string to puree
FINISHED
